io.spine.server.entity

Class DefaultEntityFactory<E extends Entity>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.entity.model.AbstractEntityFactory<E>
      • io.spine.server.entity.DefaultEntityFactory<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityFactory<E>, java.io.Serializable

    public final class DefaultEntityFactory<E extends Entity>
extends AbstractEntityFactory<E>
    Default implementation of entity factory which creates entities by invoking constructor which accepts entity ID.
    See Also:
